title: Level up capsule
body: This is the second time this has happened, when i leveled up I didn't get my level up capsule. Can I get some help here please?

replies.body:
I went ahead and checked up your loot and levelup history, and it does look like you got all the levelup capsules you were supposed to and already opened them. The latest one gave you....

Champion (Shard): 2 Fiddlesticks
Champion (Shard): 1 Ashe
Crafting Currency: 270 Blue Essence
Ahhhhh, I see. Thanks for the help mang <3

If you level up and skip the after game lobby, and go to your loot tab, your capsule will be there for you to open. After your next game, going into the lobby after the game, you'll get the notification saying you got your capsule, but then you might not have realized that you already opened the capsule which you got a notification for afterwards. If you honestly believe you're missing a capsule, I'm sure they can look into it for you, and tell you whether or not you already opened it.
Yeah, if you could do that for me please. I don't mean to bother you, i'm just wondering. Sorry.
